2. Define the scope of comparison: The claim is comparing the attendance of week 8 (row 7) to the first 10 weeks (rows 1-6 and row 9).

6. Determine if the claim is true or false: Compare the attendance value of week 8 (row 7) to the minimum attendance found in step 5. If they are equal, the claim is true; otherwise, the claim is false.
